price: Ataambiwa: Soma kitabu chako! Nafsi yako inakutosha leo kukuhisabu.
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا
footnotes: Ataambiwa: Soma kwa uwezo wa Mwenyezi Mungu, ijapo kuwa duniani alikuwa hajui kusoma. Soma kitabu cha a'mali zako. Hicho leo kinatosha kukuhisabia na kukudhibitia vitendo vyako.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
